TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ComponentSerializationService extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供基底類別，以序列化元件集合或可序列化物件至序列化存放區。

span.span: Provides the base class for serializing a set of components or serializable objects into a serialization store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將一組元件或可序列化的物件序列化為序列化存放區。The serializes a set of components or serializable objects into a serialization store. 稍後可以還原序列化儲存區。The store can then be deserialized later. 類別與其他序列化配置的序列化格式是不透明的並且允許部分序列化的物件。The class differs from other serialization schemes in that the serialization format is opaque, and it allows for partial serialization of objects. 例如，您可以選擇只選取的屬性的物件進行序列化。For example, you can choose to serialize only selected properties for an object. 這個類別是`abstract`。This class is `abstract`. 一般而言，會提供這個類別的具體實作，並將它加入做為服務及其。Typically, a will provide a concrete implementation of this class and add it as a service to its . 這可讓最適合這些格式中要序列化的物件。This allows objects to be serialized in the format best suited for them. 類別取代了介面從.NET Framework 1.0 版中，雖然後者保留回溯相容性。The class replaces the interface from the .NET Framework version 1.0, although the latter is retained for backward compatibility.

span.para: 當您繼承自類別，您必須覆寫這個類別中的所有方法。其中某些方法所擲回例外狀況，設計述，在其對應的主題。強烈建議衍生類別遵循這些指導方針，以維護一致性的作業。如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別。

When you inherit from the class, you must override all the methods in this class. Some of these methods were designed to throw exceptions, as documented in their corresponding topics; it is strongly recommended that derived classes follow these guidelines to maintain consistency of operation. For more information, see the class.

abstract member CreateStore : unit -> System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore

span.span: Creates a new .

returns.span: 新建立的序列化存放區。

span.span: A new created serialization store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多個物件可以序列化到相同的序列化存放區。Multiple objects can be serialized into the same serialization store. 當您完成與存放區時，您可以呼叫其或方法。When you are finished with the store, you can call its or method. 序列化存放區一旦關閉，可用於還原序列化時，或您可以儲存成資料流。Once closed, a serialization store can be used for deserialization, or it can be saved into a stream. 序列化存放區可以傳遞至任何建置一整組物件的序列化狀態序列化方法。The serialization store can be passed to any of the various serializing methods to build up serialization state for a group of objects.

summary.span: 還原序列化指定的存放區，以產生物件集合。

span.span: Deserializes the given store to produce a collection of objects.

summary.span: 還原序列化指定的存放區，以產生物件集合。

span.span: Deserializes the given store to produce a collection of objects.

returns.span: 根據儲存狀態建立的物件集合。

span.span: A collection of objects created according to the stored state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會還原序列化`store`產生其中包含的物件的集合。This method deserializes `store` to produce a collection of objects contained within it. 還原序列化物件的已序列化的順序相同。Objects are deserialized in the same order in which they were serialized.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DeserializeTo (System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore store, System.ComponentModel.IContainer container);

span.span: The to deserialize.

param.name: container
param.span: 要加入 物件的容器。

span.span: The container to which objects will be added.

summary.span: 還原序列化指定的 至指定的容器中。

span.span: Deserializes the given to the given container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法還原序列化`store`，但而非產生新的物件，它適用於資料存放區中的現有的一組物件取自提供的容器。The method deserializes `store`, but instead of producing new objects, it applies the data in the store to an existing set of objects that are taken from the provided container. 如此一來，呼叫端可以事先建立物件但得以透過適當。As a result, the caller can create in advance an object however it sees fit. 如果物件已還原序列化狀態物件的名稱不在現有物件的集合中，將會建立新的物件。If an object has a deserialization state and the object is not named in the set of existing objects, a new object will be created. 如果該物件也會實作，它就會加入至`container`。If that object also implements , it will be added to `container`. 在容器中的物件必須具有名稱和物件的序列化存放區中要使用現有的物件相符的型別。Objects in the container must have names and types that match objects in the serialization store in order for an existing object to be used.

exception.span: 或 為 。

span.span: or is .

exception.span: 不包含序列化容器可以處理之格式的資料。

span.span: does not contain data in a format the serialization container can process.

param.name: store
param.span: ，value 的狀態將序列化至其中。

span.span: The to which the state of value will be serialized.
The object to serialize.

summary.span: 序列化指定的物件，因而能夠產生預設屬性值。

span.span: Serializes the given object, accounting for default property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準序列化，以實作透過方法，只會序列化和不同元件的預設狀態的值。Standard serialization, as implemented through the method, only serializes values that differ from the component's default state. 這會提供最精簡的序列化機制，但假設在還原序列化期間，將使用新建立的物件。This provides the most compact serialization mechanism but assumes that a newly created object will be used during deserialization. 如果使用現有的物件時，還原序列化的物件不保證重複原始狀態的序列化的物件;在還原序列化期間，會重於序列化期間包含預設值的屬性設回其預設值。If an existing object is used, the resulting deserialized object is not guaranteed to duplicate the original state of the serialized object; the properties that contained default values during serialization will not be reset back to their defaults during deserialization. 方法不會使用這個快速鍵。The method does not use this shortcut. 它會序列化來源物件的所有屬性，好讓還原序列化可以還原所有物件的屬性，不論預設狀態。It serializes all properties of the source object so that deserialization can restore all the object's properties, regardless of default state. 因為可能會變更的組成項目集合中的順序，這個方法是序列化的集合，特別有用。This method is particularly useful for serializing collections, because the order of the constituent items within the collection can change. 在此情況下，最安全的程序來還原整個集合的原始狀態為其原始的屬性值來覆寫的所有項目。In this circumstance, the safest process to restore the original state of the entire collection is to overwrite all the items with all their original property values.

exception.span: 或 為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以多次叫用來建立一份已序列化的序列化存放區中的成員相同的物件。The method can be invoked multiple times for the same object to build up a list of serialized members within the serialization store. 一般情況下，成員應該是屬性或事件。In general, the member should be a property or an event.

summary.span: 用預設屬性值序列化指定物件上的指定成員。

span.span: Serializes the given member on the given object, accounting for the default property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會序列化`member`上`owningObject`，即使`member`包含預設屬性值。The method serializes the `member` on `owningObject`, even if `member` contains the default property value. 請注意，對於某些成員，包含預設值，並還原到成員的相同值的設定不同的概念。Note that for some members, containing the default value and restoring the setting of the same value to the member are different concepts. 例如，如果屬性是繼承它的值從父物件時未不設定任何本機的值，設定至屬性的值可能無法預期。For example, if a property inherits its value from a parent object when no local value is set, setting the value back to the property may not be what is desired. 方法列入考量，並會在此情況下清除屬性的狀態。The method takes this into account and would clear the state of the property in this case.
